headline: Evercore upgrades Capital One as it sees a 21% upside on Discover deal
summary: Investing.com -- Evercore ISI upgraded Capital One Financial Corp (NYSE:COF) to "Outperform" from "In Line," focusing on long-term earnings upside from its pending acquisition of Discover Financial Services (NYSE:DFS), offsetting the near-term risks like consumer weakness and regulatory concerns. Brokerage’s price target on the stock was $200, roughly a 21% upside.

summary: Underperformance was driven by stock selection in the consumer discretionary, real estate and communication services sectors.
